resources.string: Creating a group will make this device the group owner. This means this device will be the one to host the server which could lead to increased power consumption. Creating a group can be used to determine the device that will be the server host manually as searching allow the Android system to determine this.

Searching for users will search for nearby devices that have wifi direct enabled. This search can pick up all devices with this feature. When connecting using this option the server host will be determined by the Android system. If you want to control who the server host is see the create group option.
